name: directoryList
syntax: directoryList(path [, recurse] [, listInfo] [, filter] [, sort] [, type])
description: List the contents of a directory. Returns either an array, or a query.

params.name: path
params.description: The path to a directory. If given a relative path, that path will be relative to the server"s temp directory.

params.name: recurse
params.description: If `true` directoryList traverses the directory tree.

params.name: listInfo
params.description: Sets the return type. `name` returns an array with only the file names, `path` returns an array with the full path names and `query` returns a query containing the follwing fields: `Attributes`, `DateLastModified`, `Directory`, `Link`, `Mode`, `Name`, `Size`, `Type`.

params.name: filter
params.description: Applies a filter to the listed files, for example, `*.jpg`. Multiple filters can be applied by using a pipe delimiter. For example: `*.doc|*.xls`

params.name: sort
params.description:
Columns by which to sort. e.g. `Directory, Size DESC, DateLastModified`.
Lucee4+, the sort argument only works when `listInfo="query"`

params.name: type
params.description: CF9+ Filter the result to only include files, directories, or both.

examples.title: An array of files in this directory
A query of files in this directory sorted by date last modified
An array of files in the temp directory
examples.description: Including sub-directories and as an array containing full paths
